    General API Twitter API

Arabic Dialect Identification (ADiD)

Identify Arabic dialects of text, Twitter users ,and Twitter hashtag, using Machine Learning Approach.

Try our API Documentation

General API

General API Features

General API

Take JSON file & output predicted dialects of text.

Dialect Distribution

Display distribution info of the identified dialects for the given JSON file.

Prediction Percentage

Display prediction probability for all possible dialects in text.

Press the button to try the API

API example

Twitter API

Twitter API Features

Twitter API

Take either twitter @user or #hashtag, and output predicted Arabic dialects.

Dialect Distribution

Display distribution info of the identified dialects for the given JSON file.

Predection Percentage

Display prediction probability for all possible dialects in text.

Press the button to try the API.
